message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. What do you say?
You took 90%, I'll take 40% this time. Next round, I'll take more!
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 70% this time, but I'm not budging much more than that. Your turn again!
You're not budging, I won't either. Meet me in the middle!
Let's meet in the middle, but I'm not giving you the majority. I'll take 50% and we can call it a day.
